Forensic Economics Services Across New England

MBA Economics Court-Qualified Expert Serving All 6 States

Expert economic loss analysis and damage calculations for legal cases throughout Rhode Island, Massachusetts, Connecticut, New Hampshire, Maine, and Vermont. Find a forensic economist near you.

Comprehensive Forensic Economics Services by Location

Skerritt Economics & Consulting provides expert forensic economics services throughout New England. Our economic damage analysis services are available in all major cities and regions, with consistent methodologies and court-tested approaches regardless of location.

We understand the unique economic conditions, wage patterns, and employment markets in each state and city we serve, ensuring accurate and locally-relevant economic loss calculations.

Forensic Economics Services We Provide

Regardless of your location in New England, we offer comprehensive economic damage analysis including:

Personal Injury Economic Loss

  • Lost earnings and benefits calculations
  • Future earning capacity assessments
  • Household services valuations
  • Medical cost projections

Wrongful Death Damages

  • Loss of financial support
  • Loss of household services
  • Loss of parental guidance
  • Present value calculations

Employment Litigation

  • Lost wages and benefits
  • Front pay and back pay
  • Mitigation analysis
  • Pension valuations

Commercial Damages

  • Lost profits analysis
  • Business interruption
  • Diminished business value
  • Extra expense calculations
